# Results

## Checking robustness against the choice permuted genes

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
`%&&%` <- function(a,b) paste(a,b,sep='')

rep1.dir <- '../result/20180602/obs/'
rep2.dir <- '../result/20180605/obs/'
gwas.name <- 'igap_ad'

rep1.file <- rep1.dir %&&% '/gene-' %&&% gwas.name %&&% '.txt.gz'
rep2.file <- rep2.dir %&&% '/gene-' %&&% gwas.name %&&% '.txt.gz'

.cols <- c('med.id', 'hgnc', 'factor', 'data', 'gwas', 'ld.idx')
.data.cols <- c('theta', 'theta.var', 'lodds', 'lfsr')

.read.lo <- function(...) {
    ret <- suppressMessages(read_tsv(...) %>% select_(.dots = c(.cols, .data.cols))) %>%
        mutate(theta.se = sqrt(theta.var))
}

tab <- .read.lo(rep1.file) %>%
    left_join(.read.lo(rep2.file), by = .cols, suffix = c('.1', '.2')) %>%
    na.omit()

tab.robust <- tab %>% filter(lfsr.1 < .05, lfsr.2 < .05, sign(theta.1) == sign(theta.2))

plt <- ggplot() +
    xlab('Mediation log-odds in experiment 1') + ylab('Mediation log-odds in experiment 2') +
    geom_point(data = tab, aes(x = lodds.1, y = lodds.2), size = .5) +
    geom_point(data = tab.robust, aes(x = lodds.1, y = lodds.2), col = 2, size = 2, pch = 21)
    
ggsave(filename = '20180613-' %&&% gwas.name %&&% '-lodds.pdf', plot = plt, width = 5, height = 5)
print(plt)

.aes.y <- aes(ymin = theta.2 - theta.se.2, ymax = theta.2 + theta.se.2)
.aes.x <- aes(xmin = theta.1 - theta.se.1, xmax = theta.1 + theta.se.1)

plt <- ggplot(tab, aes(x = theta.1, y = theta.2)) +
    xlab('Mediation effects in experiment 1') + ylab('Mediation effects in experiment 2') +
    geom_errorbar(data = tab.robust, .aes.y, col = 2) +
    geom_errorbarh(data = tab.robust, .aes.x, col = 2) + 
    geom_point(size = .5) +
    geom_point(data = tab.robust, col = 2, size = 2, pch = 21)

ggsave(filename = '20180613-' %&&% gwas.name %&&% '-effect.pdf', plot = plt, width = 5, height = 5)
print(plt)

## End of robustness
```
